title: Witness

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Sharp Eyes (Night): Choose a player. Find out all players who visited them and all players who they visit.
- Little Birdie (Day): Choose a player. You will send a birdie to their house tonight. Your birdie will report back to you at the start of the following day letting you know whether your target left their house last night.
- All Seeing (Night, 1 use): Choose a player and predict who they visit tonight. If you are correct, you will learn their role. You may predict that your target will not visit anyone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Your Little Birdie will notify you if your target uses any ability that would cause them to leave their house, including Astral abilities.

desc:
Post 1098
*You don't need to join a protection program if you join the dark side.*
